subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- U.S. military reports the deaths of 14 troops in Iraq in the last 48 hours, including 5 in a Baghdad roadside bombing Thursday.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

>+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
Where there is terrible need, there is an opportunity to help.
CNN is working to empower the individual who asks "What can I
do?" Go to http://www.CNN.com/ImpactYourWorld to find out how
you can lend a hand.
